sections.description: Feel free to reach out to me if any of my mentioned skills align with your field of interest. I come with an upbeat attitude on life and no amount of work is a challenge to me. I find efficient ways to resolve a problem and often tend to go the extra mile.

Learning software development was (or still is) a challenging journey for me since I did not come from a tech background. The syntax alone made me want to avoid this field several times. I had to push myself to learn and often ended up hitting brick walls which took a lot of time to navigate around. There would be frustration built up around me for errors as simple as missing a colon.
